meanings.definition: Not belonging to or associated with a conference.
meanings.sent1: The nonconference team arrived early for the match.
meanings.sent2: Her nonconference attire stood out among the formal suits.
meanings.sent3: The nonconference meeting was like a surprise party in the office.
meanings.sent4: His nonconference approach to problem-solving was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The nonconference room was decorated in a unique style.

meanings.definition: A game or event that is not part of a conference schedule.
meanings.sent1: The basketball team played a nonconference game last night.
meanings.sent2: Attending a nonconference event allowed her to network with new people.
meanings.sent3: The nonconference tournament felt like a mini-vacation for the players.
meanings.sent4: The nonconference match was a breath of fresh air for the fans.
meanings.sent5: The nonconference competition brought out the best in the athletes.
